doc:
Joseph Anthony https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joseph_Anthony 0 Joseph Anthony (May 24, 1912 – January 20, 1993) was an American playwright, actor, and director. He made his film acting debut in the 1934 film Hat, Coat, and Glove and his theatrical acting debut in a 1935 production of Mary of Scotland. On five occasions he was nominated for a Tony Award for Best Direction. Joseph_Anthony ( May_24_,_1912 – January_20_,_1993 ) was an_American_playwright , actor , and director . He made his_film_acting_debut in the_1934_film_Hat , Coat , and Glove and his_theatrical_acting_debut in a_1935_production of Mary of Scotland . On five_occasions he was_nominated for a_Tony_Award for_Best_Direction .
